import React, { Component } from "react"; class About extends Component { render() { return (

About Page

I would like to apply for the .Net Developer role. This role will be a learning and enhancing journey for me in terms of my technical, social and overall development. On the education front, I have graduated and attained the Master of Information Technology degree from Monash University in December 2018. Despite being an international student, I have been able to maintain decent grades along with my part time work to manage my expenses through the masters. My university studies helped me to gain very good knowledge and expertise skills in C# MVC, JavaScript, ReactJS, Azure, HTML, CSS, SQL and related technologies. In Monash, I had the opportunity to be part of Postgraduate Industry Experience where I was involved in real time web application development. The project was mentored by eNett Company and the university. I, along with my team developed a website: CheerUp (Product Video) for improving mental health in 10 weeks (target audience was university students). My role in the team was that of a full stack developer, which required me to act as: database engineer, deployment engineer, system architect, security engineer and backend functionality coder/developer for our project. The website was based on C#, .Net MVC architecture and was built from scratch. Our team won the award for the best project for the topic and were highly appreciated by all the judges from the industry. It was an exposure for me to work in multicultural teams and agile environment. I have always been keen about how everything (front end, back end, database, hosting, security) works and this encouraged me to gain considerable knowledge and experience in the same. I have also developed mobile application projects in Android and IOS (swift) and possess very strong interest in mobile apps and games development. Prior to my Masters, I completed my Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science in 2014. I graduated in first class with distinction and soon started working with Endeavour Systems for maintaining Indian government websites of income tax department and water treatment plant. These websites were based on ASP.Net and it gave me an exposure and expertise for working on live projects. After working there, I switched to Grid Infocom Pvt. Ltd., where I was hired as Technical consultant / RPA (Robotic Process Automation) -Developer. I have been a part of the IT industry for approximately 4 years now and I have gained the expertise and skills to be a key IT professional. As an IT graduate, I have the skills and technical capabilities that role demands. My knowledge bucket includes variety of skills as listed in the CV attached. Working and learning various languages improved my ability to understand how most of algorithm works, making easier for me to understand new language and new environment.

); } } export default About;
